Package org.apache.juneau.rest.arg

Class RestOpContextArgs

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.rest.arg.SimpleRestOperationArg
org.apache.juneau.rest.arg.RestOpContextArgs
All Implemented Interfaces:
RestOpArg
public class RestOpContextArgs
extends SimpleRestOperationArg
Resolves method parameters on RestOp-annotated Java methods of types found on the RestOpContext object.
  • JsonSchemaGenerator
  • ParserSet
  • RestOpContext
  • SerializerSet
  • Java Method Parameters

    • create

      public static RestOpContextArgs create​(ParamInfo paramInfo)
      Static creator.
      Parameters:
      paramInfo - The Java method parameter being resolved.
